definition: to circle/to go back/to turn around/to answer/to return/to revolve/Hui ethnic group (Chinese Muslims)/time/classifier for acts of a play/section or chapter (of a classic book)
to revolve/to turn/to circle about/to walk about/classifier for revolutions (per minute etc): revs, rpm/classifier for repeated actions
to turn/to change direction/to transfer/to forward (mail)

sentences.english: It is available for optional multi-turn functionality.
sentences.chinese: 這種執行器提供了可選擇的多回轉功能。

sentences.english: Cimmaron . This ski run has a giant slalom feel to it with good reason.
sentences.chinese: 這個滑雪場運行有大回轉的感覺是很有道理的。

sentences.english: This paper deals with the thermal performance of high pressure rotary seals.
sentences.chinese: 本文敘述了對高壓回轉密封件的熱性能研究。

sentences.english: In a quick turnabout, the existence of stickiness is supplanted by the oppositional being of the hand.
sentences.chinese: 迅速回轉，黏性的存在被手的相對存在所取代。

sentences.english: Group 31 compact valve actuators are designed for coupling to small quarter-turn ball and butterfly valves.
sentences.chinese: 該小型閥門執行器專爲小回轉球閥，蝶閥設計的。

sentences.english: Turns on parallel skis are used in both Slalom and GS.
sentences.chinese: 在小回轉和大回轉中都要用到兩板平行的轉彎。

sentences.english: The director could be slewed quite quickly until the range operator picked up the target echo.
sentences.chinese: 指揮儀快速回轉直到測距手捕獲目標的反射回波。

definition: to sway/to swing/to move back and forth/to oscillate
to move/to shift/to move out of the way/to divert (money etc) to a different purpose
to rotate (about an axis)/to revolve/to turn/to move in a circle/to gyrate
everything steady and stable (idiom); overcautious and unimaginary
